actions.name: Relic Soloist
actions.description:
Trigger: The user resolves Relic Song
Effect: Connection - Relic Song. The user transforms into its Pirouette Forme. The user may also chance to Pirouette Forme as either a Simple Action (4 PP), or as a Downtime Action.
